abstract: Federal Judge Shira A Scheindlin approves class-action settlement representing thousands of New York State prisoners that will overhaul way solitary confinement is used in state.

headline.print_headline: Judge Backs Settlement  on Isolation  of Inmates
headline.main: Overhaul of Solitary Confinement Is Approved for New York’s Prisons

snippet: A federal judge signed off on a class-action settlement intended to alter the practice, but concerns remain about the state’s ability to carry out the deal.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge signed off on a class-action settlement intended to alter the practice, but concerns remain about the state’s ability to carry out the deal.
